about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Conveniently enhance bleeding-edge initiatives.
about.article:
Due to the popularity and increasing demand for brunch menu items in Koreatown, KLAT offers simple yet exquisite dishes all carefully crafted using the finest ingredients and fresh breads baked daily.

We take much pride in our coffee and work very closely with our roasters to ensure a premium cup of brew each and every time. Many hours were spent researching the art & science behind coffee to achieve that distinctive flavor, unique for KLAT.

The modern upscale interior with elegant touches of copper and green trees were designed to offer guests an exceptional and relaxing experience from dining to décor.

categories.description: Our light sandwiches and paninis use fresh ingredients and daily baked breads. Each order comes with a side of vinaigrette salad and/or soup.

items.name: Prosciutto Panini
items.ingredients: Thin slices of prosciutto, fresh arugula, roasted bell pepper, mozzarella, tomato, and balsamic; grilled & pressed on ciabatta bread served with a light vinaigrette salad.

items.name: Chicken Pesto Panini
items.ingredients: Chicken marinated in pesto sauce, roasted pepper, tomato, butter lettuce, and mozzarella; grilled & pressed on ciabatta bread served with a light vinaigrette salad.

items.name: BBLT Sandwich
items.ingredients: Bacon, brie, lettuce, tomato, roasted bell pepper, and homemade aioli; grilled & on sour dough bread served with a light vinaigrette salad.

items.name: Grilled Triple Cheese Sandwich
items.ingredients: Muenster, brie, cheddar cheese on sour dough bread served with tomato soup.

categories.description: From Benedicts, to omelets, to huevos rancheros; whether fried or poached, all our eggs are cooked to perfection adjoined with other ingredients for a savory flavor and a gorgeous presentation.

items.name: Klat Benedict
items.ingredients: Our popular Klat Benedict comes with two poached eggs, thin slices of prosciutto, tomato, spinach and hollandaise sauce served with a side of vinaigrette salad.

items.name: Salmon Benedict
items.ingredients: Two poached eggs, gravlax, spinach, red onions, capers, and hollandaise sauce served with a side of vinaigrette salad.

items.name: Huevos Rancheros
items.ingredients: Two sunny-side up eggs, prime short rib steak on top of a tortilla with beans, salsa, queso fresco, and crema fresco.

items.name: California Omelet
items.ingredients: Smoked bacon, fresh tomato, roasted pepper, green onion, avocado, sour cream, & cheddar cheese served with a side of herb seasoned potatoes.

items.name: Spinach Omelet
items.ingredients: Spinach, mushroom, sun-dried tomatoes, chives, and goat cheese served with a side of herb seasoned potatoes.

items.name: Brioche French Toast
items.ingredients: Topped with seasonal berries, banana & maple syrup or honey

categories.description: All of our salads are fresh and served in large portions with our house made dressings.

items.name: Stegg Salad
items.ingredients: Prime short rib, sunny-side up egg topped on frisee & spinach with a side of grilled vegetables.

items.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
items.ingredients: Little gem lettuce and crostini mixed with house made Caesar dressing.

items.name: Quinoa Salad
items.ingredients: Red quinoa, roasted beet, lacinato kale, dried currant, toasted pecan and lemon vinaigrette dressing.

categories.description: A great batter and precise baking time is the key to achieving that perfect waffle - crispy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside.  We use seasonal berries and honey roast the pecans in-house.

items.name: Breakfast Waffle
items.ingredients: Bacon, Scrambled eggs, Tomato & Side of Fruits.

items.name: Honey Nut
items.ingredients: Banana slices, candied pecan, and honey whipped cream.

items.name: Berry Berries
items.ingredients: Fresh seasonal berries with lemon custard and powdered sugar.

categories.description: French toast, bread pudding, maple syrup, and berries. Top it off with our rich and creamy house made ice creams!

items.name: Hand Crafted Ice Cream
items.ingredients: Vanilla / chocolate served with fruits

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.ingredients: Waffle with Fruits, nutella & topped with vanilla ice cream

categories.description: Some of our ‘special’ menu includes steak, pastas and a few popular Asian dishes and our always changing, soup du jour (tomato, chicken quinoa, cream of asparagus, *clam chowder).

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.ingredients: Beef & pork tomato meat sauce, extra virgin olive oil & parmasan cheese.

items.name: Rib-Eye Kimchi Fried Rice
items.ingredients: Fried in a wok & served with steamed egg in a skillet.

items.name: Shrimp & Bacon Fried Rice
items.ingredients: Bacon, asparagus, peas, green onion fried with scrambled eggs.

items.name: Blue Jam Toast
items.ingredients: Brioche Toast Topped Ricotta Cheese with Blue Jam.

coffees.title: Coffees
coffees.description: Coffee tastes can vary depending on the region they’re grown in. These unique flavor characteristics can derive from many factors, including the climate, altitude, ripeness of the fruit, washing method, and the sole genetics of the plant (Arabica or Robusta).

categories.description: Coffee originated in Ethiopia. Ethiopia is the only country in which coffee is wildly grown, which makes the flavor profile extremely diverse. These beans are strong, fragrant-rich and full-bodied flavors.

Guatemalan coffee traditionally exhibits high malic acidity, caramel, and clean cups with a ton of sweetness. These coffees are usually very balanced with a good mixture of smooth sweetness and some tart, fruity acidity. They are often described as having a “clean” flavor.
Asian coffees tend to be earthier and darker than most other blends. The beans are less acidic, more complex and at times even savory.

Brazil is the world’s largest coffee producer and provides 25 percent of the United States’ coffee beans. With a relatively mild and light taste, Brazilian coffee has a less-clean after taste and is more chocolaty and a little creamier.
Colombian Coffees are commonly known to be big, rich, chocolaty coffees with often great acidity. More intense acidity and bigger velvety body are variations you might find going from south to north.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Conveniently redefine distributed collaboration and idea-sharing via quality best practices. Distinctively revolutionize compelling niche markets rather than client-based customer.
